page.title: 01Area Summary
page.content: In our area there are mostly fields and woods. There are quite a lot of farmers which have dairy cattle or sheep but some farmers have crops. We have an industrial estate. One of the factories there collects the wool from the local farms. The wool is stored and then is sent to Barnstaple to be cleaned and made into things. There is also a chipboard factory on its own about a mile away from the others. The factory takes timber from the woods and makes it into chipboard. Most holiday makers come to South Molton to enjoy the countryside and views. In South Molton there is a honey farm which is very big. Many visitors go there to see the bees.
